attributes.contentHtml:
Oh yes, our man trying to look like a grown-up but he keeps saying the same 2 words over and over, and calls people retards. If you didn't know, Using punctuations and talking on a chat like how to support members to in emails and call people retards doesn't make you look like a grown-up. I mean, I can see over here that you don't have any arguments left my man. I mean, y'all can see in here THE AUDACITY this guy haves to call me a retard... the same guy which claimed a website which he stole as being his. Are you serious? I think you should have a look in the mirror before calling people retards.

I'm OuT. GoOdByE. (I'm mocking you. - I've left it in here if your brain can't even figure it out by itself.)
